description: Isle of Man teachers will receive one-off payments in December, the education minister says.
title: Manx teachers' pay deal implemented despite NASUWT opposition
title_page: Manx teachers' pay deal implemented despite NASUWT opposition - BBC News
maintext: Acknowledging the ongoing dispute, he said the offer was "not the end of anything" but "the start of a new beginning" in the relationship between the DESC and educators.
